title: TiendexApp - Credit & Inventory Management SaaS
description:
Modern SaaS web application for small local stores and family-owned businesses in Latin America to manage products, customers, and credit ("fiado"). Replaces traditional paper notebooks with a mobile-first, fast, and reliable digital solution.

**Tech Stack:**
- Next.js 14+, TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, shadcn/ui, Framer Motion
- Firebase (Firestore + Auth)
- Deployed on Vercel
- Spanish language with i18n infrastructure

**Key Features:**
- Marketing landing page (bold, modern design)
- Dashboard for product/customer management
- Quick credit entry workflow
- Customer list with outstanding balances
- Payment tracking
- In-app notifications

See PRD for complete details.
